title: DirectX
body:
Just curious, as I have been getting the "Unknown DirectX error" when I try to load into a game and then I can't ever connect.
Do you need directX 12 to play LoL now? I tried using the other solutions that were given a few months ago, but none of them worked.
I am on a PC, Nvidia Graphics Card, DirectX 11.0, Windows 7. Restarting the client, reinstalling the game, deleting config folder has done nothing.

replies.body: This error can come up for a few reasons, mostly security settings preventing some game files from being accessed correctly or driver issues.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to add League as an exception, then our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure your drivers are in good shape.  I hope that helps!
